entries.femaleVariant: Hey, V.
Gonna drink to Johnny.
Wanna drink to Jackie.
Rogue, gonna drink to Rogue.
What about my drink? I'll drink to me.
Mix me up a Silverhand. Drinkin' to Johnny.
V. I've long awaited this moment. To look the latest Afterlife legend in the eye – I must say, I'm moved.
Happy not to disappoint.
I have confirmed the intel leaking out of Arasaka. The casino is currently testing a new security system.
I mean, I only know what people say about 'im, but... bet he'd looove what you're planning. Shit, he'd be over the damn moon.
Boss.
Hey. We good?
Get you somethin'?
[Sit] Whaddaya got for me?
Perfect. Your box is ready an' waitin'.
[Lean in] The usual.
[Lean in] No thanks.
My usual.
Sure thing.
People can tell something's up. Won't be able to keep it under wraps much longer.
Won't have to. Take off's today.
Today...?
Nothin' for me, thanks.
I understand. It's the big day, isn't it? You're meetin' him?
Mhm.
So – I'm gonna knock one back. Your health, V. And to the mission.
I know.
Good luck, V.
Mix me up a Welles. Gonna drink to Jackie.
Miss him, don't you?
Mhm... This place was Jack's dream, y'know? Afterlife legends, that's what we were gonna be.
Well, then you made his dream come true.
Good luck, V.
Drinkin' to Rogue.
Gotta say, she'd be happy to see you in her box.
Think so?
Remember that first time you asked her for help? She was hard on you, wasn't she?
Know what she told me later? She said, "She's got that blood, Afterlife blood. She'll make the city hers or it'll kill her. No third option."
entries.maleVariant: Know what she told me later? She said, "He's got that blood, Afterlife blood. He'll make the city his or it'll kill him. No third option."

entries.femaleVariant: Think that was why she decided to help you. And, well, she was right.
Heh. That she was…
What about my drink? Let's raise a glass to me. Might need it.
Want the Afterlife to make a drink in your name, you gotta die first. You know the rules.
Oh, but I did die, Claire.
I'm the best. Won't let you down.
Got doubts?
Won't be disappointed. Picked the best merc around for the job.
Having second thoughts? Hope that doesn't mean you wanna drop out.
So I've heard. But I'd like it proved to me as well.
Drop out? At this stage? No, it would make no sense, I'd take a hit.
Speaking of which – nobody's ever pulled off a stunt like this.
Is that a problem?
No, no. Just… in that case, you're gonna need somethin' special.
Rogue had this little ritual. Before any big op, she'd knock back a shot of tequila. Silverhand's preferred.
Asked her once if it was for luck or whatever. Know what she said?
Said it was about remembering. Said that remembering Johnny that way helped her focus on what was important.
They'd be all kinds of wrong.
It's why you hired me.
Guess that's why you hired me.
Huh. You know why I hired you? Because you'd do anything at all for even the faintest chance at survival.
They'd be dead wrong, all of 'em.
I'm primed for this.
Ladies first.
Weyland. Back and better than ever?
Hey. Back at your post already?
Anyways, Afterlife tradition – gonna mix you up one of our specials. Just tell me who we're drinkin' to.
Huh, um, OK...? OK, I'll... I'll mix you somethin'.
And good luck, V.
Rogue had this little ritual. Before any big op, she'd knock back a shot of tequila. Silverhand's preferred.
And it's true – they will be shutting it down briefly today. I believe you'll know how to use that moment.
Talk to me.
Where I'm from, they'd say it's straight impossible.
Self-confidence worthy of a legend. Or of someone risking it all.
Oh, I never forget a promise. Good luck.
This time tomorrow – should have the casino's client data, all of it.
Don't forget your side of the bargain.
Even if it meant coming to within a hair's breadth of your untimely death.
Hmm. But I sense you know what it's like to lose everything. To fight for one last breath. I see it in you.
Lookin' brand new.
Put you back together beautifully. Brand, shiny new Weyland.
Ready and waitin'.
But what you plan to do today, V... I mean, respect. Nothin' else will ever come close.
Take gooood care of yourself. And good luck.
Thanks.
Heheh. Yeah, somehow. Anyway, had enough of sittin' on my ass in the clinic. Feel much better here.
You tell everyone here about that stunt you pulled at Arasaka Tower?
entries.maleVariant: You tell anyone here about that stunt you pulled at Arasaka Tower?

entries.femaleVariant: Whadda you think? Claire musta heard it three times already.
Where you can tell everyone about your 'Saka Tower heroics?
entries.maleVariant: Where you can tell everyone about your 'Saka Tower heroics.

entries.femaleVariant: Heh, ya know it!
Hey.
[Drink]
[Stand]
Sit down. Let's talk.
I wouldn't mind knowing what's sprouted in your mind, V.
Is everything in order?
Boss?
So what'd hit the spot about now?
Hey, boss.
Life treatin' you all right?
Hey, Rogue. How's things? Everything in order?
Hey. What's the sich?
Hey. Client seems settled in.
Hey. Client's here, waiting.
You tell me. Afterlife, all that goes on here – it's your mess now.
Sit down, let's talk a minute. Before all that swallows you whole.
Oh, no you don't. Unusual situation – you just can't have the usual.
Off into the wild blue today. And you're well aware of the stakes.
Sure, keep remindin' me…
Before any big op, and you know this, I'd oil the cogs with a little glass of tequila... Johnny's preferred.
We all got our rituals, charms, lucky underwear…
Not talkin' about luck, talkin' about remembering. Remembering Johnny... which is how I knew what this was all for. What I was doing in this mess.
Rogue...
So you're gonna honor Afterlife tradition. Claire's gonna mix you a house drink. You just name it.
I'll drink to Johnny.
I'll drink to Jackie.
How about mine? Wanna drink to me.
He'da gone with you, I just know it. Couldn't resist an op like this.
I know.
You miss him?
This place, it was Jackie's dream. He wanted to work with fixers like you. Legends.
Well, consider his dream fulfilled.
I'n't high time to have a V on the menu? Let's drink to me. Could use it today.
Mh, gotta die to have a drink named after you at the Afterlife. You know the rules.
Agreed, and I do know the rules. But I did die, Rogue.
[Drink]
Break a leg, V. This heist – if anybody can pull it off, that person's you.
[Stand] Thanks.
I remember his smile every time he sensed the world rocking, on the verge of collapse. He'd be smilin' today.
You did. A living legend of the Afterlife – how about that.
Well then clearly you've risen from the dead. With a bigger head, too.
Wanted everybody at the Afterlife to know our names. "Major leagues, V, that's the place to be, the major leagues."
Somebody like this deserves something special, Claire.
Long story. Might get the chance to tell it to you some day.
OK, I'm willin' to drink to that. Claire, bring us something… appropriate.
Thanks, Rogue.
Mh. I get that. Got an important meeting today.
Goin' up today, Rogue.
Your ritual, your lucky underwear? Not sure that's my thing.
So mock me all you want, but I, choomba, drink to you.
Drink. It'll do you good.
Heheh. Having trouble deciding?
Sit down, V. We should talk.
Be careful up there and good luck. And come back to us. Afterlife's your home now.
Everything chill?
Hey. All chill here?
Hey. Client here yet?
Hey. Client here yet?
Mmm, yep. Lying in wait, by the booth.
Uh-huh. And he can wait a little longer.
Heh, intrigued to hear what this client has to say.
I would be too. He awaits. But before you go off, let's you and me swap a few thoughts.
Hm, aye, be waitin' for me moment. Long enough me back end's complainin' with a pain.
Heard you goin' after somethin' big, V. Shimmerin' luck to you, always.
Thanks, Crispin.
Well, V... Mikoshi was quite the punch, you TKO'd Arasaka, in fact. Brought you eddies, influence around town. But not just that.
It meant positive paralysis of Arasaka systems. A few additional hatches opened up, my people rushed in, grabbed what they could.
So it's all systems go for the op.
They'd say you're taking too big a risk. Poetically speaking, flying towards the sun to burn up.
